nodes.text: This estate was owned by Lord Grathan on the reconstituted Sith Empire's capital of Dromund Kaas during the Cold War. It served as his warehouse where his guard protected artifacts and relics. During the apprenticeship of Darth Nox to Lord Zash, Nox was assigned to infiltrate the bunker and acquire both a tablet and the cyber neutralizer, a prototype weapon, developed by the scientist Dorotsech, to help them defeat Darth Skotia. A task which the young apprentice performed successfully.
The estate first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online roleplaying game (MMORPG) by BioWare released on December 20, 2011.
